divs: Sighting Details2006 12:00 pm. I was sitting on my scooter on the corner of US Hyw 41 and symmes rd. InGibsonton, Fl. I looked up and observed 3 metallic balls flying around in the air approx 1000ft high. They were staying connected but moved around each other. They were maneuvering in a figure 8 pattern but kept changing the leading ball. In other words they were revolving around each other as they patterened the figure 8. I would have to estimate them to have been 20-30 ft in diameter. One was almost black and the other two were silver. They reflectd the sun. It was a cloudy day so I could only see them in a break in the clouds. I watched for about 15 seconds.
